inputs.name: target
inputs.label: Target
inputs.helpMarkDown: The build script target to run.

inputs.name: verbosity
inputs.label: Verbosity
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies the amount of information to be displayed.

inputs.name: useBuildAgentNuGetExe
inputs.label: Use the Build Agent Nuget
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use the nuget.exe installed with the build agent.

inputs.name: nugetExeDownloadLocation
inputs.label: Nuget Exe Location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Where to fetch the nuget executable from if not using the build agent nuget. Defaults to `https://dist.nuget.org/win-x86-commandline/latest/nuget.exe`

inputs.name: ToolFeedUrl
inputs.label: Tool Feed Url
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use an alternate nuget package feed for cake and tools. Defaults to `nuget.org`

inputs.name: Bootstrap
inputs.label: Bootstrap the cake script using the --bootstrap
inputs.helpMarkDown: Download/install modules defined by #module directives in the cake script file

inputs.name: Version
inputs.label: dotnet-cake Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version of dotnet-cake to use for running the script. Defaults to latest version.
